document_data.name: Barana Talmere
document_data.mainbody: '''Barana Talmere''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Amaunator]] from the town of [[Eveningstar]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Barana was a stout and muscular [[dwarf|dwarven]] woman with plain brown hair, clean-shaven face, and light skin. She wore a set of [[chainmail]] adorn with Amaunator's ''[[holy symbol]]''.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, Barana Talmere asked a band of [[adventurer]]s from the world of [[Eberron]], who were transported to [[Toril]] by a rift, to lend a hand defending the town of [[Eveningstar]] during the [[Darkening]]. Barana notofied the adventurers of an unnamed [[drow]] [[necromancer]] from [[House Szind]] using the [[Deep Glen Graveyard]] in [[King's Forest]] to bolster the drow armies in the war against Eveningstar.
